get_lat(obj)[source]

Retrieves the latitude information for a particular venue.

Parameters

obj – A session queryset.

Returns

None if the record does not exits, else it returns the latitude of the venue.

get_long(obj)[source]

Retrieves the longitude information for a particular venue.

Parameters

obj – A session queryset.

Returns

None if the record does not exits, else it returns the longitude of the venue.
